description: A paginated call to retrieve a summary report of actual Amazon Web Services charges and the calculated Amazon Web Services charges based on the associated pricing plan of a billing group.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: A ListBillingGroupCostReportsFilter to specify billing groups to retrieve reports from. BillingGroupArns (list) --- The list of Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) used to filter billing groups to retrieve reports. (string) ---

nested_params.name: BillingGroupArns
nested_params.description: The list of Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) used to filter billing groups to retrieve reports.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a billing group.

nested_items.name: AWSCost
nested_items.description: The actual Amazon Web Services charges for the billing group.

nested_items.name: ProformaCost
nested_items.description: The hypothetical Amazon Web Services charges based on the associated pricing plan of a billing group.

nested_items.name: MarginPercentage
nested_items.description: The percentage of billing group margin.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's used on subsequent calls to get reports.
